title: Translucent Skin
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||Stealth +50. Slightly reduced enemy accuracy||Your translucent skin slightly reduces your foes' accuracy.
|-
|2||Stealth +50. More greatly reduced enemy accuracy||Your translucent skin reduces your foes' accuracy.
|-
|3||Stealth +50. Most greatly reduced enemy accuracy||Your transparent skin significantly reduces your foes' accuracy.
|- 
| colspan="3" |
Accuracy reduction is 2*mutation level. Has no effect if the enemy can't see you.
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
| colspan="3" |
[[Jiyva mutation]]
|}
